name: Dhow Marcom Agency
description:
We are a Marketing & Communications agency; we pride ourselves on introducing a cutting-edge perspective to address our clients‚Äô needs within the dynamic and rapidly evolving landscape of global innovation and technology.

Guided by the esteemed values of the Dhow, a historic vessel that facilitated the exchange of goods and culture across the seas.

Similar to the dhow, which served as a conduit for strategic relationships, shaping the economy and knowledge of the region‚Äôs citizens through its journeys, we envision ourselves as vessels for our clients‚Äô brands. Our commitment involves working collaboratively, hand in hand, to support their vision and realize their goals.

Possessing an in-depth understanding of the Market Dynamic, we provide tailored, strategic, and integrated marketing and communications solutions. Our diverse talents ensure a harmonious blend of expertise, strategy, creativity, and cultural diversity. Passion fuels our work, and we navigate our clients‚Äô journeys proactively and genuinely, consistently ensuring that their experience is truly remarkable.

At DHOW, our dedication lies in cultivating enduring relationships with our people & partners, grounded in trust, integrity and excellence.

We aspire to be your steadfast companion on the voyage to success and growth, infusing every interaction with a personal touch and a profound sense of purpose.

Welcome on board, Embark On A journey toward success!

From global ambitions to local impact, DHOW is ready to meet you. Reach out to book an appointment or share your request at Ahoy@dhow-me.com.

company_updates.description:
We‚Äôre excited to share that we recently participated in the Governance of Emerging Technologies Summit (GETS) 2025 in Abu Dhabi!
¬†
Held on May 6th at the St. Regis Saadiyat Island Resort, this esteemed event brought together over 500 global leaders from governments, academia, industry, and civil society to explore the latest innovations in AI, quantum computing, cybersecurity, and digital governance.
¬†
Our CEO, Bouchra Danwra (Global Citizen), and Media Director, Wafa Obeid, were honored to contribute to the strategic dialogue, highlighting the importance of harmonizing storytelling, technology, and policy to drive responsible progress.
¬†
A huge thank you to the Advanced Technology Research Council (ATRC) and the UAE Public Prosecution for organizing this impactful event under the patronage of His Highness Sheikh Mansour bin Zayed Al Nahyan. 

We're proud to be part of the conversation shaping the future of emerging technologies!
¬†
#AbuDhabi #UAE #GETS2025 #AI #Innovation #Governance #CyberSecurity #DHOWMarcomAgency

Honored to share the inspiring words of our visionary leader Stephen Gresty on the #YouAreWhatNext campaign.

Stephen's contribution has been incredible. His perspective has ignited real conversations across borders and generations, reminding us that communication is about: building connection, empowering people to act, and creating a movement that grows with every new voice that joins in.

#Leadership #Communication #PeopleFirst #ThoughtLeadership

We are so inspired, join us in congratulating her! 

#ForbesCouncils #MarketingAgency #Growth

company_updates.reshared_post_description:
I am humbled and proud to share that I have joined the Forbes Councils  ‚Äî an invitation-only #community of global leaders and executives, carefully selected by #Forbes for their impact and contribution to business and society.
For me, it is a milestone and a responsibility to contribute to meaningful conversations about strategic media ,marketing, leadership, and communication, and to explore how stories and strategies can cross borders, inspire people, and shape industries.
My passion lives at the intersection of human connection and strategic vision ‚Äî where communication builds trust, culture ignites growth, and leadership becomes the bridge uniting generations and communities across borders.

YES! Together, we can unlock potential, build stronger organizations, and create impact that lasts.

I am deeply grateful for this opportunity and excited to connect with the inspiring leaders within this council .
#ForbesBusinessCouncil #Leadership #StrategicCommunication #GlobalBusiness #Executives

Exhibitions, Roadshows and industries events are ecosystems of opportunity.

Do you know it is an industry worth over $50 billion a year, bringing together 300+ million visitors and 4.5 million exhibitors globally, exhibitions remain one of the strongest engines for B2B growth and cross-border collaboration.

So why do they matter so much?

‚úÖ¬†80% of companies say the leads they generate here are stronger than anywhere else.

‚úÖ¬†Face-to-face connections build trust faster than digital ever can.

‚úÖ¬†They give industries a stage, where markets turn into communities, and ideas into deals.

But Beyond the numbers, exhibitions fuel economies, spark innovation, and build reputations.

Now, the real question for leaders isn‚Äôt whether exhibitions matter. It‚Äôs:
How do you turn that visibility into measurable impact?

At DHOW Marcom Agency, we partner with clients to unlock scale, identify the exhibitions that truly match their vision, and unleash their full potential ,ensuring they don‚Äôt only participate, but lead, influence, and shape the future of industries.
¬†
#Leadership #Exhibitions #CorporateEvents #BusinessGrowth #Strategy

From strategic growth to navigating digital transformation and most recently, overseeing MBC Group‚Äôs IPO, his contribution has been nothing short of transformational.

I had the privilege of witnessing firsthand his clarity of vision, resilience, and human approach to leadership.

V.U.C.A ‚Äì B.A.N.I ‚Äì A.G.E.N.T: Navigating Rapid Change with Human Connection

Originally coined by Warren Bennis and Burt Nanus to describe leadership in a Volatile, Uncertain, Complex, and Ambiguous (VUCA) world, this concept has evolved. The modern world now mirrors B.A.N.I‚ÄîBrittle, Anxious, Non-Linear, Incomprehensible‚Äîa framework by futurist Jamais Cascio, reflecting today‚Äôs relentless pace of change.

Yet, we‚Äôre moving further into a new phase: A.G.E.N.T‚ÄîAging, Grey-haired, Experienced, Novel, Trainers. This paradigm was inspired by delivering in-person training across five countries in just three weeks. The journey revealed an essential truth: "humans thrive on connection"‚Äîto laugh, challenge, grow, and learn together. 

Technology is vital but no substitute for human interaction. Initiatives like M.O.R.S.E (Help Yourself 2 Help Others) reinforce this ethos. If you're ready for transformation, and you need a special AGENT let‚Äôs connect‚Äîbefore it‚Äôs too late!¬†

#Pepsi has long focused on the product: crisp taste, refreshment, and celebrity-driven campaigns highlighting the what.

#Coca_Cola, on the other hand, sells a feeling: family, nostalgia, joy rooted deeply in the why behind every sip.

Both approaches are powerful, but only when used in the right context. üëå

üëâ Is it the features?

Whether your brand should lean into product-driven messaging or emotional storytelling depends on your audience, market position, and long-term goals.

Why #DHOW? The Story Behind the Name

For centuries, dhow ships have sailed the seas, carrying goods, connecting cultures, and standing as a testament to craftsmanship and resilience. These handcrafted vessels were more than just a means of transportation, they were lifelines for trade, symbols of exploration, and a bridge between distant shores.

Dhows were built with precision, designed to withstand unpredictable waters, and relied upon for their ability to navigate challenges. They weren‚Äôt just ships; they were a representation of #adaptability, strength, and purpose.

At DHOW Marcom Agency, we carry this same spirit in everything we do. Just as dhows connected people and markets, we connect #brands with their audiences through strategic, thoughtful #marketing. Every campaign, every message, and every brand story we create is designed with the same level of care and expertise that went into crafting these legendary ships.

#Craftsmanship: Like dhows, our marketing solutions are not one-size-fits-all. We build strategies tailored to each brand‚Äôs unique identity and goals.

#Connection: Just as dhows linked distant lands, we create strong connections between brands and their audiences, ensuring #engagement and impact.

#Resilience: The marketing world is ever-changing, but we navigate through challenges with agility, ensuring our clients always stay ahead.

#Innovation with Tradition: While dhows have evolved over time, they have never lost their essence. Similarly, we embrace new ideas and technologies while staying true to our core values, quality, #creativity, and effectiveness.

Our name, DHOW, is a tribute to this legacy, a reminder that great things happen when craftsmanship meets purpose, when strategy meets adaptability, and when brands find their true voice in an ever-evolving world!

Why DHOW? Because connection, resilience, and innovation are what drive us forward.

#DHOW #AdvertisingAgecny #BrandIdentity #Innovation

At its core, creativity isn‚Äôt just about making things look better, it‚Äôs about making them work smarter. The challenge isn‚Äôt just to create, but to create with purpose!

The Future of Marketing, Communications, and PR in 2025, in the words of our CEO, Bouchra Danwra (Global Citizen): 

As we move further into 2025, the #marketing and #PR world is evolving at an unprecedented pace. Having worked with brands across diverse industries, I‚Äôve seen firsthand how agility and innovation define success in this dynamic landscape. At Dhow Marcom Agency, we believe that staying ahead means not only embracing change but also leading it with authenticity and purpose.

#AI is no longer a futuristic concept, it‚Äôs here, transforming how brands engage with their audiences. From automated customer interactions to hyper-personalized content, AI is enhancing, not replacing, human #creativity.

More than ever, consumers crave realness over perfection. They want brands to stand for something beyond their products or services. Purpose-driven messaging, transparency, and ethical business practices are no longer optional‚Äîthey are essential for building long-term trust and loyalty. Brands that align their actions with their words will be the ones that thrive.

Immersive experiences are redefining engagement. Augmented reality (AR), virtual reality (VR), and the metaverse are no longer abstract concepts but powerful tools that allow brands to create deeper, more meaningful connections with their audiences. Those who leverage these technologies effectively will set themselves apart in an increasingly crowded digital space.

Influencer marketing is also shifting, with micro and nano influencers gaining prominence. Their authenticity and strong community ties make them invaluable partners for brands looking to build genuine relationships with consumers. It‚Äôs not about reaching the most people; it‚Äôs about reaching the right people in meaningful ways.

With third-party cookies disappearing, the focus on first-party data has never been greater. Brands must rethink how they collect and use consumer information, ensuring transparency and ethical data practices. Those that prioritize consumer trust will build stronger, more sustainable relationships with their audiences.

Short-form video is now the dominant force in content marketing. Platforms like TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts have changed how audiences consume information. To capture attention in a fast-scrolling world, brands must create concise, engaging content that resonates instantly.

#Sustainability and transparency are no longer just corporate buzzwords! They are business imperatives. Consumers expect action, not just promises. Companies that authentically integrate sustainability into their core values and communicate their efforts clearly will win the trust and loyalty of a conscious audience.

As a leader in this space, I‚Äôve always believed that success lies in adapting to change while staying true to your brand‚Äôs core values. What trends do you see shaping 2025? Let‚Äôs continue this conversation.

#Marketing #AI #DigitalTransformation #PR #Leadership

‚ÄºÔ∏è Your Brain Has Been Hacked‚ÄîBy a #Color ‚ÄºÔ∏è

Without realizing it, your mind has been programmed to link specific shades to brands. Ever wondered why you instantly associate a soft blue with Tiffany & Co.? Or why that bold red feels unmistakably Ferrari? Colors aren‚Äôt just visuals‚Äîthey‚Äôre brand assets, emotional triggers, and storytelling tools.

That‚Äôs the Signature Color Effect‚Äîthe power of color in branding!

Let‚Äôs break it down:

ü©µ #Tiffany Blue ‚Äì A symbol of love, elegance, and timeless beauty. This delicate blue isn‚Äôt just a shade; it‚Äôs a promise of sophistication, instantly reminding us of Tiffany & Co.‚Äôs exclusivity and charm.

üß° #Herm√®s Orange ‚Äì Originally chosen out of necessity due to WWII material shortages, this vibrant orange became an icon of luxury and craftsmanship. Today, a Herm√®s box sparks instant desire and status recognition.

üî• #Ferrari Red ‚Äì A color that embodies speed, passion, and adrenaline. It traces back to racing history when red was the assigned color for Italian cars, but today, it‚Äôs a Ferrari trademark that commands attention and excitement.

Why does this matter?

Color isn‚Äôt just design‚Äîit‚Äôs psychology. It influences perception, evokes emotions, and builds recognition. When used right, a color can become an irreplaceable part of a brand‚Äôs legacy.

Now, we want to hear from you! What‚Äôs a color that instantly makes you think of a brand? Comment Below!

We all want a world free of discrimination, but change doesn‚Äôt happen overnight. It requires awareness, action, and a willingness to challenge even our own biases!

In an insightful conversation, our CEO Bouchra Danwra (Global Citizen) and media presenter Wafa Obeid reflect on why discrimination persists and what it takes to create a world where differences are not just accepted, but celebrated. 

üí° It starts with awareness‚Äîbut action makes the difference.

üé• Watch the full interview here: https://lnkd.in/e7sYj-ur

üåç March 1 ‚Äì Anti-Discrimination Day 

Discrimination still exists, not because the world lacks progress, but because human history has reinforced divisions through culture, politics, and systems that benefit from them. 

Yet, at DHOW Marcom Agency, we believe in the power of communication to reshape narratives, challenge biases, and build a future where humanity stands as one. 

This Anti-Discrimination Day, we bring you an exclusive conversation between our CEO, Bouchra Danwra (Global Citizen)  and our media presenter, Wafa Obeid  as they share insights on why discrimination persists and how we can all contribute to a more inclusive society. Stay Tuned!

From the best in us, around the world , let‚Äôs use our voices to shape a future where diversity is embraced, differences make us stronger, and our world feels like home for all.

#AntiDiscrimination #BreakingBarriers #InclusiveMarketing #DiversityandInclusion #DHOWMarcom #MarketingAgency

We are proud to share the words of our CEO:
"We inspire and unite people through stories that transcend borders. In a world that often highlights differences, we focus on what connects us. Through communication, we bridge gaps, spark ideas, and create a lasting impact. As humans, we have more that unites us than divides us".
Bouchra Danwra (Global Citizen)
At DHOW Marcom Agency, 
You have our commitment to meaningful conversations and impactful influence.

#dhowmarcomagency #agency #marketing #communication #internationalagencies #marketing #inspiration #influence

name: Pencil Group
description:
Pencil Group is a cultural marketing group of 99+ talents, uniting a diverse range of strategists, writers, poets, designers, rappers, composers, filmmakers, technologists, digital creators, producers and more, to grow and nurture cultural connections between brands and their people.

The digital revolution expanded culture into an interesting world of subcultures, allowing brands to connect deeper and faster. We believe that when culture comes first, products follow. Every product and service carries the potential to build its own cultural values that are meaningful to its consumer community.
